channel.title: Vps and vpn
channel.description: whts the diffrence between them? i have a vpn but what does a vps do and do i need it for my server???

item.title: Vps and vpn
item.dc:creator: @mapu mapu
item.description:
@mapu wrote:

VPS is usually a shared server as well. A VPN is more or less something you would be using for a proxy service. Just an extra connection between you and the internet to mask your own connection.

Read full topic

item.title: Vps and vpn
item.dc:creator: @EmulousGuru EmulousGuru
item.description:
@EmulousGuru wrote:

VPS = Virtual Private Server. = Online ‘virtual’ computer, which hosts your server.
VPN = Virtual Private Network. = Connection which isn’t really your connection.

(I’m probably wrong with the descriptions [technically] but that’s basically what they are)

Read full topic
